item.description:

That is certainly what Airbus is thinking.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to julien51.

That is certainly what Airbus is thinking.

item.title: By: julien51
item.dc:creator: julien51
item.description: This is very true. However, I can't help but think that in the long term, the number of "slots" available in each airport will be the biggest constraint for airlines and then, bigger planes means larger sales.
item.content:encoded: This is very true. However, I can’t help but think that in the long term, the number of “slots” available in each airport will be the biggest constraint for airlines and then, bigger planes means larger sales.
